Texts.Eng:
The unicorns are tricky ones of the bunch. Despite being frailer than their kin and their weakness to going mad from revelations, their magical powers and their affinity to cosmic energy are quite great. They value themselves as craftsponies more, their magic being in most cases mundane.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Herbivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Energy +^green;20%^reset;, Damage +^green;5%^reset;, +^green;15^reset;% E. Regen
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Aether
  ^cyan;Racial Ability: Unicorn Glow^reset;

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Aether/Crystalline: Energy x^green;1.1^reset;, and +^green;10^reset;% Physical Resist.
  Atropus: -^red;10^reset;% E. Regen, Damage and Energy x^red;0.9^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  +^green;20^reset;% Staff Mastery, +^green;10^reset;% Wands and Energy

^orange;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Defense x^red;0.9^reset;.
  ^red;25% more suspectible to madness effects, harder to cure madness.^reset;

^orange;Resists^reset;:
 +^green;20^reset;% Cosmic, +^green;5^reset;% Fire, Ice, Electric, Poison, -^red;20^reset;% Shadow, -^red;15^reset;% Radiation.
Texts.Chs:
独角兽是这群人中最狡猾的。尽管他们比他们的亲属更脆弱，也容易因启示而发疯，但他们的神奇力量和对宇宙能量的亲和力是相当大的。他们更看重自己的手艺，他们的魔法在大多数情况下都很平凡。

^orange;饮食^reset;：草食动物

^orange;天赋^reset;：
能量+^green;20%^reset;，伤害+^green;5%^reset;+^green;15 ^reset;%生命再生
^cyan;免疫^reset;：以太
^cyan;种族能力：独角兽辉光^reset;

^orange;环境^reset;：
以太/水晶：能量x ^green;1.1 ^reset;，和+^green;10 ^reset;%物理抗性。
代表作：-^red;10 ^reset;%生命再生、伤害和能量x ^red;0.9 ^reset;

^orange;武器^reset;：
+^green;20 ^reset;%法杖精通，+^green;10 ^reset;%魔杖和能量

 ^orange;弱点^reset;：
防御x ^red;0.9 ^reset;。
 ^red;对疯狂效果的怀疑增加25%，更难治愈疯狂^reset;

^orange;抗性^reset;：
+^green;20 ^reset;%宇宙射线抗性，+^green;5 ^reset;%火、冰、电、毒-^red;20 ^reset;%暗影抗性，^red;15 ^reset;%辐射抗性。
